trans-unit.source: Displays a hyperlink-style button control on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 显示在网页上超链接样式按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [LinkButton Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction Use the LinkButton control to create a hyperlink-style button on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#introduction) - [LinkButton 控件和验证](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [声明性语法](#DeclarativeSyntax) # # 介绍使用 LinkButton 控件在网页上创建一个超链接样式按钮。

trans-unit.source: The LinkButton control has the same appearance as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control, but has the same functionality as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: LinkButton 控件具有相同的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件，但具有相同的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: If you want to link to another Web page when the control is clicked, consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要链接到另一个网页，当单击控件时，请考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The LinkButton control renders JavaScript to the client browser.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> LinkButton 控件呈现 JavaScript 客户端浏览器。

trans-unit.source: The client browser must have JavaScript enabled for this control to function properly.
trans-unit.target: 客户端浏览器必须为此控件启用 JavaScript 才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: For more information on client script, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关客户端脚本的详细信息，请参阅[客户端脚本中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can create either a Submit button or a Command button.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建一个提交按钮或命令按钮。

trans-unit.source: A Submit button does not have a command name associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 提交按钮没有与之关联的命令名称。

trans-unit.source: The button simply posts the Web page back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 该按钮仅将 Web 页面回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: By default, a LinkButton control is a Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，LinkButton 控件是一个提交按钮。

trans-unit.source: You can provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click> event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Submit button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 你可以提供的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click>事件以编程方式控制的操作执行时单击提交按钮。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click>

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, a Command button has a command name associated with the button, such as `Sort`.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，命令按钮有与该按钮，如关联的命令名称`Sort`。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A> property to specify the command name.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A>属性指定的命令名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create multiple LinkButton controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which LinkButton control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 这样可创建在网页上的多个 LinkButton 控件和以编程方式确定哪些 LinkButton 控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument%2A> property with a Command button to provide additional information about the command to perform, such as specifying ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument%2A>与命令按钮来提供有关要执行，例如，指定按升序进行排序的命令的其他信息的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command> event to programmatically control the action performed when the Command button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以提供的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command>单击其中的命令按钮时执行的事件来以编程方式控制的操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 此控件可用于显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the LinkButton control.
trans-unit.target: 文本不是 HTML 编码 LinkButton 控件中显示之前。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。

trans-unit.source: ## LinkButton Controls and Validation By default, page validation is performed when a LinkButton control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: # # LinkButton 控件和验证通过默认情况下，页验证 LinkButton 控件被单击时执行。

trans-unit.source: Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control.
trans-unit.target: 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定由验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件。

trans-unit.source: To prevent page validation from occurring, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CausesValidation%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止发生页验证，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # 声明性语法``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: Adds the attributes of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control to the output stream for rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: 添加的特性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件添加到客户端上呈现的输出流。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>包含要在客户端上呈现的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the control that an element, either XML or HTML, was parsed, and adds the element to the control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 通知控件元素，XML 或 HTML，已经过分析，并将该元素添加到控件的<xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the parsed element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，它表示已分析的元素。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否执行验证时<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: By default, page validation is performed when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，执行页验证时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control.
trans-unit.target: 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定由验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件。

trans-unit.source: You can specify (or determine) whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked by using the CausesValidation property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定 （或确定） 是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件被单击使用这属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: To prevent validation from being performed, set the CausesValidation property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止正在执行验证，请将这属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly set to `false` for a Reset or Clear button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常设置为`false`重置或清除按钮以防止在单击该按钮时执行验证。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the CausesValidation property is set to `true`, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.ValidationGroup%2A> property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control causes validation.
trans-unit.target: 如果这属性的值设置为`true`，你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.ValidationGroup%2A>属性来为其指定验证组的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件将导致验证。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation is performed when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control is clicked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果执行验证时<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件是单击; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: The Click event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 将引发单击事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control, as in the case of a Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用时与不关联任何命令名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控制，如提交按钮。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: The Command event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 命令事件引发时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用时的命令名称，如`Sort`，与关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此选项，可以创建多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>在网站上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Command event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 通过控件层次结构中的窗体中引发的命令事件`BubbleEvent`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an optional argument passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command"></xref> event handler along with the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置传递给的可选参数<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command"></xref>以及相关的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName*>

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandArgument property to specify an argument that complements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CommandArgument 属性指定自变量，用于补充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The CommandArgument property is typically only used when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> CommandArgument 属性通常是只使用时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A>属性设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CommandArgument property complements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A> property by allowing you to provide any additional information about the command to perform.
trans-unit.target: CommandArgument 属性补充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A>属性，它允许你提供有关要执行的命令的任何其他信息。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A> property to `Sort` and set the CommandArgument property to `Ascending` to specify a command to sort in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A>属性`Sort`和将 CommandArgument 属性设置为`Ascending`以指定的命令按升序进行排序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An optional argument passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command"></xref> event handler along with the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName*> property.
trans-unit.target: 可选自变量传递给<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command"></xref>以及相关的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandName*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the command name associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与关联的命令名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This value is passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command"></xref> event handler along with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument*> property.
trans-unit.target: 此值传递给<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command"></xref>事件处理程序以及<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument*>

trans-unit.source: When you have multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controls on a Web page, use the CommandName property to specify or determine the command name associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果你具有多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件在网页上，使用 CommandName 属性来指定或确定与关联的命令名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>单击的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: You can set the CommandName property with any string that identifies the command to perform.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置与任何字符串，标识要执行的命令按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then programmatically determine the command name of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control and perform the appropriate actions.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以以编程方式确定的命令名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件并执行相应的操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: Additional information about the command, such as an `Ascending` sort order, can be specified by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关该命令的其他信息如`Ascending`排序顺序，可以通过使用指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The command name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 命令名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> object that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control's postback behavior.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref>对象，表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件的回发行为。

trans-unit.source: The GetPostBackOptions method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> object that represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control's postback behavior.
trans-unit.target: GetPostBackOptions 方法创建<xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>对象，表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件的回发行为。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> object is then typically passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%28System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions%29?displayProperty=fullName> method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to post back to the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>对象通常然后传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%28System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法，用于获取对客户端脚本函数的引用，调用时，会导致页回发到服务器。</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetPostBackEventReference%28System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> class.
trans-unit.target: 在扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>时，使用此方法主要由控件开发人员

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control's postback behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions"> </xref>表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件的回发行为。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous request that was saved with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState*> method.
trans-unit.target: 从已保存的上一个请求还原视图状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SaveViewState*>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the control state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示要还原的控件状态的对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click>引发事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control, as in the case of a Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用时与不关联任何命令名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控制，如提交按钮。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnClick 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the client-side script that executes when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click"></xref> event is raised
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置时，会执行的客户端脚本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click"></xref>引发事件

trans-unit.source: Use the OnClientClick property to specify additional client-side script that executes when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 使用 OnClientClick 属性指定时，会执行的其他客户端脚本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click>引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: The script that you specify for this property is rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control's `OnClick` attribute in addition to the control's predefined client-side script.
trans-unit.target: 为此属性呈现在指定的脚本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件的`OnClick`属性除了控件的预定义的客户端脚本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The client-side script that executes when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 时，会执行的客户端脚本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click"></xref>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command>引发事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用时的命令名称，如`Sort`，与关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此选项，可以创建多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>在网站上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command> event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command>通过控件层次结构中的窗体中引发事件`BubbleEvent`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnCommand method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnCommand 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control to perform any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content to the client.
trans-unit.target: OnPreRender 方法通知<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件来执行任何必要的预呈现步骤之前将视图状态和呈现内容保存到客户端。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据的对象。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置发送时从当前页的页 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"> </xref>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: The PostBackUrl property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.
trans-unit.target: PostBackUrl 属性允许你执行跨页面 post 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: Set the PostBackUrl property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 将 PostBackUrl 属性设置为网页的 URL 时要发送到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: For example, specifying Page2.aspx causes the page that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control to post to `Page2.aspx`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，指定 Page2.aspx 会导致包含的页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件来发送到`Page2.aspx`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the PostBackUrl property, the page posts back to itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 PostBackUrl 属性的值，在页发回发到自身。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A> property is `true` before processing the postback.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 时执行跨页回发与带有服务器端验证的控件，你应检查页的<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A>属性是`true`之前处理回发。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the PreviousPage.
trans-unit.target: 对于跨页回发，页面以检查是 PreviousPage。

trans-unit.source: The following Visual Basic code shows how this is done: ``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ``` For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 下面的 Visual Basic 代码演示如何做到这一点︰``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ```跨页发送技术的详细信息，请参阅[跨页发布 ASP.NET Web 窗体中](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 要从当前页时发送网页的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"> </xref>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这将导致页后，可以回发到自身。

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控制当回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: This event is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control, when it is clicked, to raise a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click> event, and if defined, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command> event.
trans-unit.target: 内部使用此事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件，它被单击时，引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click>事件，并定义，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Command> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件自变量。

trans-unit.source: Renders the contents of the control to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: 将控件内容呈现给指定的编写器。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，它表示要在客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the <xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref> attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否应设置<xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref>到呈现的 HTML 元素的属性"disabled"时控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示 ASP.NET 应的呈现方式 HTML 控件时控件被禁用。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 呈现`disabled`属性时控件被禁用。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 呈现`class`属性时控件被禁用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than `4.0`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于`4.0`; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件自变量。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text caption displayed on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置上显示的文本标题<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the Text property to specify or determine the caption to display on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用文本属性来指定或确定要在上显示的标题<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 此控件可用于显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text caption displayed on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 上显示的文本标题<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件组的其中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category.
trans-unit.target: 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。

trans-unit.source: Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page.
trans-unit.target: 每个验证组都可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidationGroup property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ValidationGroup 属性来为其指定的验证组名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: This property has an effect only when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性才起作用时，才的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the ValidationGroup property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当指定 ValidationGroup 属性的值，只有的验证控件才是指定组的一部分时验证<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控件回发到服务器。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for this property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性的值与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`，该控件发回发到服务器时，该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件进行都验证。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 为其控件组的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton"></xref>控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。
